titles.title: A bill to suspend until January 1, 1991, the duty on N-(2-hydroxyethyl) -2,4,6-triiodo-5-(2(2,4,6-triiodo-3- (N-methylacetamido)-5-(methylcarbomoyl).

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.
Executive Comment Requested from State, Treasury, Commerce, Labor, ITC, USTR.

bill.summary: 3/30/1988--Introduced. Amends the Tariff Schedules of the United States to suspend the duty on N-(2-hydroxyethyl)-2,4, 6-triiodo-5-(2(2,4,6-triiodo-3(N-methylacetamido)- 5-(methylcarbamoyl) benzamido acetamido)-isophthalamic acid until January 1, 1991.
